# Chandan Kumar Thakur (The WH2)

Nepal-based AI architect, web developer, and cybersecurity enthusiast focused on building sovereign digital ecosystems.

## About
Chandan Kumar Thakur, known as The WH2, develops real-world systems like AI-driven traffic solutions, custom AI platforms such as TalkGPT, and multiple web applications aimed at solving practical problems. With a strong White Hat mindset, he prioritizes security, deployment, and impactâ€”turning ideas into live, scalable platforms that serve both innovation and national growth.

## Core Projects
- **Portfolio:** https://thewh2.netlify.app/
- **SMM Store:** https://wh2store.netlify.app/
- **TalkGPT:** AI platform for conversational excellence.
- **Cybersecurity:** Ethical hacking and security audits.
